attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is hereby proposed that the Prime Minister (Mr: Gordon Brown),
Dismis all politicians, who break the law, for their own personal gains, in any guise or form.
The dismisal should be applied to the loss of all Parliamentary priviledges and salaries, the action to take effect immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
